MAN.TITLE: OR applied to binary representation of inputs arguments
MAN.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: OR applied to binary representation of inputs arguments

DESCRIPTION.P: Given x and y two positives integers, this function returns z the decimal number whose the binary form is the OR of the binary representations of x and y (x, y and z have the same size). If dimension of x is superior than 1 then z(i) is equal to bitor(x(i),y(i))
